Content: Galle Magistrate Nilupuli Lankapura, further remanded Ukranian national and captain of the Avant Garde Vessel, Gennady Gavrilov until August 8, when the latter was produced before courts yesterday (01). The Criminal Investigation Department (CID) arrested Gavrilov on June 24, with regard to the ongoing investigation of the vessel belonging to the controversial Avant-Garde company. The company is alleged to have illegally imported firearms to Sri Lanka and illegally possessing firearms and explosives.
